entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 15 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow or ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning then changing to ice pellets in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Blowing snow over exposed areas late in the morning and early afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Ice pellets ending in the evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers in the evening and after midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing rain early in the evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023
